page.title: 05HEATHPARK ESTATE
page.content: HEATHPARK (ONCE AN OLD ARMY CAMP) IS A NEW THRIVING INDUSTRIAL ESTATE. SOME FIRMS HAVE USED THE ORIGINAL ARMY HUTS, BUT MANY NEW UNITS HAVE BEEN ERECTED. THE UNITS ARE POPULAR BECAUSE OF THE SPACE AVAILABLE AND THE CHEAP RENTAL. SOME OF THE FIRMS VISITED WERE :-{DARTMOOR SYSTEMS}(Wooden framed houses) {CAVITY WALL INSULATIONS, {TRAKPLANT}(hires out heavy plant),{ {FORRESTER FOODS}(ready prepared foods) {EAST DEVON NEWS GROUP}(produces 3 local newspapers & prints 7 others){ {WESTWARD CIRCUITS}(printed circuits){ {ROYAIR}(air conditioned units){DELVES} (transportation){COMPUDATA, AYLWARD {ENGINEERS}(sell & service pneumatic tools){KEN GIBBS}(sells & services tractors){OTTERMILL}(switchgear){ {ROSSERN FOODS}(wine & food for pubs &restaurants){DURALITE}(double glaz){ {CONSOLIDATED ELECTRONICS & AMUSMENTS.
